titles.title: Calling upon the people of the United States to recognize International Chart Day on April 26, 2018, in celebration of charts and infographics of all types.
Calling upon the people of the United States to recognize International Chart Day on April 26, 2018, in celebration of charts and infographics of all types.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Calls upon the American people to recognize International Chart Day, and supports the efforts to celebrate charts and infographics.
